benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/accounts/{childAccountId}/transferCredit - Move a given child credit to the parent level

covered: PUT Valid Request scenarios (TC01, TC02) demonstrate successful transfer and 204 response with balance updates and audit logging.
Error handling for non-existing child or parent accounts (TC04, TC05, TC12).
Validation and input safety (TC06, TC07, TC08, TC11, TC15).
gaps: Rate limiting / throttling tests are missing
Caching headers validation (ETag, Cache-Control) is missing
500 Internal Server Error scenario not explicitly tested (only 503)
Body payload validation specifics are not applicable for this PUT (no payload), but if body is introduced, add tests
More explicit edge case mappings for authentication/authorization could be added (beyond TC10)
API version negotiation coverage could be expanded beyond TC17
recommendations: Add a test for 500 Internal Server Error to cover server-side failures
Add rate limiting / throttling tests to verify 429 or service degradation
Add tests to verify caching headers like ETag and Cache-Control
Consider explicit edge cases around authentication/authorization boundaries and ensure consistent error messages
Extend API backward compatibility tests to additional client versions or migrations
Document and verify audited fields across all transfer operations
